name: A lot of bullets! - Lúcio's story
name_original: A lot of bullets! - Lúcio's story
description:
Standalone download strongly recommended for performance, all OS available.

CONTROLS:

  • Move and Jump: WASD or Arrows
  • Turret deployment: press T
  • Fire: left mouse click (leave pressed for automatic fire)
  • Aim: move your cursor

POWER-UPS EXPLAINED:

  • TURRETS (Blue boxes): pick up to deploy turrets pressing T
  • BULLET POWER (Red Boxes): bullets can destroy one more asteroid for each level before getting destroyed.
  • BULLET SPEED (Yellow Boxes): bullets have increased speed at each level.
  • TURRET LEVEL (Green box, upgrade destroying asteroids): turret have more barrels at each level.
  • GUN LEVEL (Purple box, upgrade destroying asteroids): firing time diminished and more bullets shot.

Made by:

Antonio: Development and Soundtrack

Mateus: 2D Artist
